title: Collection Agent (Digital Debt Consultant) - International -MENA
tagsAndSkills: Good English Communication,Collections Process,Debt Recovery,Collections,International Voice Process,Debt Collection,Good Typing Skills,Good Convincing Skills
jobDescription:
Job Description : Collection Agent - MENA Process.


Who are we?


We at spocto are developing a full stack collections platform that is powered by AI ML capabilities, that is radically changing collections within the debt industry.


In March 2022, we became Indias fastest fintech and most impactful start-up to join the unicorn club with a Series B fundraising round of $137 million.


We already have all the top Banks and NBFCs as our clients. We have offices in Mumbai, Chennai, Bangalore and Dubai. We plan to expand our business across the EU, USA and SE Asia over the next couple of years.


Role & responsibilities :-


  • To collect the delinquent amount from the customer over the phone or take promises from them on payment confirmation.
  • Understanding about buckets and Write off portfolio.
  • Should be able to effectively communicate while providing quality customer service as well as actively pursue knowledge of skills and tools to be used in all collection efforts.
  • Work with team members and team leads to achieve monthly targets.
  • Proven 1 - 3 years of experience in a Collection Process , Customer Service & Voice Process, If fresher should have excellent Communication skills & Typing skills.
  • Proficient in Writing Skills (Email, Good Typing etc.)

Requirements: -

  • Should be fluent in English & Excellent Communication skills.
  • Certification (e.g. DRA) is a big plus & Collection background .
  • Proven 1 - 3 years of experience in a Collection Process, Customer Service & Voice Process etc.
  • Proficient in Writing Skills (Email, Good Typing).
  • Graduation is mandatory.
  • Good Team Player.
  • Day Shifts Only

title: Branding Executive- Freshers
tagsAndSkills: Branding,BCOM,CLIENT SERVICING,digital sales,THANE,advertising,GRADUATION,corporate sales
jobDescription:
We would love to have someone who is a good influencer and be the best brand ambassador who influences small businesses as well large scale business men.
Fresher can also apply - ( we can train a Fresher)
Immediate joining required
Age limit - upto 25 years
Good Communication
An ideal person should have strong relationships with digital media agencies, media buyers, and digital marketing teams at direct advertisers in the given region.
Experience in closing branded content campaigns and deals, combo deals
Proficient at analyzing market trends to provide critical inputs for business development initiatives and the formulation of sales and marketing strategies.
Brand integration in video content and sponsorship sales for exclusive content.
Effective communication with proven abilities to work in a team.
Aggressively chase sales targets in the assigned region.
Identify, research, and target potential business prospects toward increasing the market share.
He or she has to be proactive and manage the sales pipeline on his or her own, depending on the monthly revenue targets.
Maintain relationships with existing clients and agencies.
Exceptional communication and presentation skills at all levels.
Sales of Digital products in b2b
B2B and corporate sales, branding, promoting, advertising
Meeting HNI clients and sell the digital products of Google - websites, Audio and videos, Social media sales, 360 virtual tours, etc
Brandling the clients in the indian market in all the sectors
Scheduling appointments with the decision makers and give corporate presentations
Building trust with the clients and make sure to provide the best of the service to the clients

Location-

thane,mumbai,navi mumbai,mumbaiall areas, kalyan/dombivli

Call HR to book your appointment now - Riya - 9137891307
